entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Periods of freezing rain beginning late in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
